name: Arkanoid For Painters
description: You in the game Arkanoid for Painters will have to help them destroy them. To do this you need to use the ball floating in the water.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Core 2 Duo or higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 512 MB Video RAM Storage: 140 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Core 4 Duo or higher Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 1 GB Video RAM Storage: 140 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
